# Asset Intake Template

Use this to intake new assets quickly and consistently. Keep entries short, link to evidence.

## 1) Basics

- Asset name: [name]
- Type/category: [e.g., IP license, note, commodity, claim]
- Size (target cash): [e.g., $250k–$1m]
- Short narrative (1–2 lines): [what is it, why now]

## 2) Proof & Artifacts

- Ownership docs: [links]
- Contracts/agreements: [links]
- Appraisals/valuation: [links]
- Photos/media: [links]
- KYC/IDs: [links or status]
- Bank Filings entry: [link or TODO]

## 3) Counterparties

- Seller/holder: [name, role, contact]
- Buyer/lender/investors: [names, stage]
- Legal/reviewer: [names, status]

## 4) Scoring (0–5 each)

- TTC (Time to Cash): [0–5]
- LTV (Value capture): [0–5]
- LD (Liquidity depth): [0–5]
- CC (Compliance & counterparty): [0–5]
- VF (Verification): [0–5]

Evidence/notes:

- TTC: [notes]
- LTV: [notes]
- LD: [notes]
- CC: [notes]
- VF: [notes]

## 5) Gating & Risks

- Gating items: [e.g., appraisal, opinion, LOI]
- Known risks: [e.g., title, enforceability, fraud]
- Mitigations: [brief]

## 6) Structure & Path to Cash

- Proposed structure: [e.g., license + receivable note]
- Counterparty path: [who pays, who wires, sequence]
- Target wire date: [YYYY-MM-DD]
- Owner: [name]

## 7) Next Steps (execute)

- [ ] Step 1 – [...]
- [ ] Step 2 – [...]
- [ ] Step 3 – [...]
